Text: JonYo, thx for taking the time and making a comment! cheers

80zforever, thank you for sharing!  I have received some very cool music from you.  I'm only familiar with 5-10% of what you have posted.  By the time I found you about 2 months ago some of the old posts nolonger have seeds.  I have about 30 posts that are dead-Let me know if I should post the list or email them.  If you or someone else would be kind enough to reshare/reseed.  I would be grateful.  If not, I'll be thankful for what I have :) Thanks
80spreferred, it's not a problem at all. Let me know what lps you want reseeded/reposted and I will get them up! cheers

Hi 80s me again, been through entire 80s albums posts n GI Orange not there.... Please help, oh.. and do you have the b'side of fight away the lover - GI Orange classic. Loved the b'side but cant remember its name - think it was every single day....Look forward to hearing stability - love that song!!! You are the best and I appreciate all you do...Many thanks.
Simon, check out vol 111 for GI Orange. also e-mail me danieldking at gmail dot com for stability.
As an 80's era college radio dj, I can't thank you enough for all of these torrents, 80zforever.  So much great stuff I've rediscovered!  Keep it coming, and thanks again!
Hey oldschool80s, glad that an 80's dj likes these stuff. enjoy them buddy.
